context: This chunk appears to be from the middle or latter section of the "finance_faq.txt" document, serving as a compilation of frequently asked questions (FAQs) related to personal finance and banking. The purpose is to provide concise answers to common queries on topics such as savings accounts, investments, KYC verification, credit cards, loans, and fraud/security. Key entities mentioned include the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), banks, mutual funds, and financial instruments like credit cards and loans. The overall topic is personal finance and banking regulations in India.
